pages.text: Boil is the kg of fire and water release. It currently contains 2 moves being corrosion mist and unrivaled strength.

pages.title: corrosion mist
pages.text: corrosion mist is a move that allows the user to charge up a large amount of steam that is then released in front of the user, the size, duration, damage and chakra cost of this move is dependant on the amount charged.$(br) $(li)Max charge: 30 $(li)jutsu xp needed: 400 $(li)Chakra taken at max: 1500

pages.title: unrivaled strength
pages.text: unrivaled strength is a self buff that when used will grant the user extra strength, speed, jump height, punch damage, aoe damage and a lunge punch attack. the strength of these buffs and the cost scales with its charge.$(br) $(li)Max charge: 20 $(li)jutsu xp needed: 400 $(li)Chakra taken at max: 2000 $(li)Max duration: 20 seconds
